author: darkartopia
title: Olon CNFT physical gallery London
description: Artists, fine art collectors and art lovers are disconnected from NFTs space. They find it difficult to grasp the idea behind it and enter.
solution: A space to educate everyone about NFT art and blockchain technology while providing an easy, familiar way to create, view and acquire NFTs.
experience: Art professional/Artist in leading position in a top contemporary art gallery, formed team with software developer and finance professionals
